short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Erudia your default search engine.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension sets your default search engine to Erudia so you can help refugees financially recover with each search.

Erudia is a search engine that leverages the power of your searches to battle poverty. As a not-for-profit, we use ad revenue from searches to fund microloans, helping individuals rebuild their lives with dignity and independence. 

Erudia values privacy; we never sell your data. Powered by Google, we ensure your search results are always accurate and relevant. Join us in making a difference with every search.
